p: Our study was based on routine diagnostic test data used to inform the laboratory-based surveillance of acute respiratory infections in NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde (the largest Health Board in Scotland), spanning primary, secondary, and tertiary healthcare settings. Clinical specimens were submitted to the West of Scotland Specialist Virology Centre for virological testing by multiplex real-time RT-PCR ( 58, 59). Patients were tested for 11 groups of respiratory viruses summarized in Table 1.
